stories.text:
SEEKING WORK | Helsinki, Finland | Remote

Jack of all trades in data and AI business. I am a solopreneur who builds machine learning production systems and does data-driven management consulting. I also have an academic background with a Ph.D. in systems and operations research (= analytical support for industry, management, and public administration).

Some of my recent accomplishments for clients:

* I'm currently building an insurance recommender system for a Nordic bank. So far, by collecting information from business stakeholders, insurance handlers, IT operations, and architects, I have been able to build a prototype ML model for the recommender and the data pipelines for the system.

* For a private employment agency, I've built a sales prediction system on top of a CRM database. It is in production and is used for strategic level decision-making.

* A media company client had acquired an e-commerce platform company. I integrated the acquired company's ML price prediction system into the media company's IT infrastructure.

Schedule a 30-minute meeting with me: https://calendly.com/profetia-solutions

Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/anton-von-schantz

Website: https://www.profetia.io/

Email: anton.von.schantz@profetia.io

Tech stack: Cloud services (AWS, GCP, IBM), Machine learning, Operations research, Python, SQL, R, databases, data pipelines, Docker, Ansible, Terraform, Git, Informatica, Hadoop, PowerBI, ELK stack

stories.text:
I found that limited conditions (time limit, no disruption) can push us into heart flow. for example, devaslife's newest youtube video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GznmPACXBlY&t=436s) show that code without network was so impressed. and i love the keyboard voice combine natural white noise, so i cut it. make a site so i could listen frequently.

https://floice.vercel.app/ this is the white noise site, I had code with this white noise 2 days, and it give me super power.

so i want to know any other zen moment like this, a real world's heart flow work sound, so i could collect to make flow voices.
stories.title: Someone's heart flow moment as white noise
